about_the_game:
Put Oz's shapeshifting abilities to the test and experience an intimate and close encounter with your love interest. Adds short little choice menu sex mini-games to the second dates. Nothing too racy, just text-based. There are no boundaries of which character you can have a wink-wink nudge-nudge scene with.

For ALL romance-able characters, including the DLC ones (excluding Lois, Danny, and Tennison). NSFW scenes can be toggled off or on from the game's intro.

To play:

1) Download the DLC
2) Start a new game, you will be given the option to go NSFW or not
2) During the final dates for any character, you will be given an option for these scenarios.

All proceeds go towards....

charity:water


charity:water is a nonprofit organization bringing clean and safe drinking water to people in developing countries.
